# Tailwind New Porject Create

npm init -y
npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer vite
npx tailwindcss init -p


## Porject .ENV

# Node.js
node_modules/

# Build files
/dist/
/build/

# Cache and logs
.cache/
.log/

# Compiled files
*.css
*.map

# Dependency directories
/bower_components/

# Editor directories and files
.idea/
.vscode/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
